Sentencas: The objective of this research is to develop a novel process for SOFC electrolytes and fully ceramic TBC to prepare yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) by both a sol-gel derived route and a dip-coating method.
Titulo: Advances in YSZ coatings prepared by sol-gel route. Applications to fuel cells or thermal barrier coatings.

Sentencas: The research focuses on the development of a process compatible with industrial requirements in terms of cost and easiness to processing.
Titulo: Advances in YSZ coatings prepared by sol-gel route. Applications to fuel cells or thermal barrier coatings.

Sentencas: The microstructure of dip-coated thick films is studied by varying the characteristics of an organic YSZ suspension (concentration, rheology) used as coating bath.
Titulo: Advances in YSZ coatings prepared by sol-gel route. Applications to fuel cells or thermal barrier coatings.

Sentencas: The suspension was obtained by addition of a polymeric matrix in a stable suspension of YSZ powders dispersed in an azeotropic MEK-EtOH mixture.
Titulo: Advances in YSZ coatings prepared by sol-gel route. Applications to fuel cells or thermal barrier coatings.

Sentencas: The obtained films are continuous, homogeneous and films thicknesses vary between I to 100 mu m. Different microstructures are obtained depending on the synthesis parameters of the slurry composition.
Titulo: Advances in YSZ coatings prepared by sol-gel route. Applications to fuel cells or thermal barrier coatings.

Sentencas: The microstructure of the films is found to depend on the YSZ precursor powders content and the polymeric sol/dispersant solution (EtOH-MEK) ratio.
Titulo: Advances in YSZ coatings prepared by sol-gel route. Applications to fuel cells or thermal barrier coatings.

Sentencas: Finally, the dip-coated suspensions are used to prepare dense or porous layers according to the applications.
Titulo: Advances in YSZ coatings prepared by sol-gel route. Applications to fuel cells or thermal barrier coatings.

Sentencas: The coating microstructure is engineered to decrease sintering ability, to be gas-tight for fuel cells electrolytes or to enhance thermal shock resistance for Thermal Barrier applications.
Titulo: Advances in YSZ coatings prepared by sol-gel route. Applications to fuel cells or thermal barrier coatings.
